castles.castleExplain:
Suitable for children aged 3 to 15 years 
Let your kids bounce around on this super party bouncer. The bouncy castle has a bright, balloon and celebration design that fits in with any party theme.

Option 1 – Hire one inflatable, sports hall and party room for up to 30 people. 210e for 1 hour of activity and 45 minutes party room.

Option 2 – Hire two inflatables, sports hall and party room for up to 30 people. 230e for 1 hour of activities and 45 minutes party room.

Option 3 – Hire three inflatables, sports hall and party room for up to 30 people. 260e for 1 hour of activities and 45 minutes party room.

Option4 -  Take it home and organize your own party
